ideas.title: Governing AI Agents at Scale: Unifying AI Gateways and MCP
ideas.description:
Enterprises are moving past simple chatbots into complex, business-critical AI systems. Different teams are experimenting at once, which sounds exciting but quickly turns chaotic. Costs rise, systems fragment, and reliability drops when there’s no shared control layer. The OpenAI outage in August 2025 made this painfully clear: copilots froze, chatbots failed, and productivity tanked across […]
The post Governing AI Agents at Scale: Unifying AI Gateways and MCP appeared first on Analytics Vidhya
ideas.source: Analytics Vidhya Blog | Knowledge Hub for AI and Generative AI

ideas.title: Agentic AI Training Efficiency: Less is More for Intelligent Agency
ideas.description:
Whenever it comes to training model, companies usually bet of feeding it more and more data for training. Bigger datasets = smarter models When DeepSeek released initially, it challenged this approach and set new definitions for model training. And after that came a wave of model training with less data and optimized approach. I came […]
The post Agentic AI Training Efficiency: Less is More for Intelligent Agency appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

ideas.title: Building an AI Agent Tutorial – Part 1 of 2: YouTube Summarizer Agent
ideas.description:
